title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4008.4 - Rulings after official declaration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4008.4 - Rulings after official declaration

State Regulations

Rulings of the stewards with regard to the award of
purse money, made after the result has been declared official, shall in no way
affect the mutuel payoff. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4008.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
